ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Physical_unit_interconnect_definition is a type of A Physical_unit_interconnect_definition is referenced by members of Mated_item that correspond to the mated connectors for the sub assemblies included in the design. A Physical_unit_interconnect_definition does not include the detailed wiring definition of the cables and assemblies included. A Physical_unit_interconnect_definition does not include the mating conditions or geometric information needed to describe the position and orientation of the items in the Physical_unit_interconnect_definition.

A Connector_based_interconnect_definition is the linkage between two physical connectors that specifies the mated state of that pair of connectors in the context of an assembly that includes the components those connectors are related to. The connectors each are part of an item in the product for which the referenced by associated_definition is a definition.
A Connector_based_interconnect_definition can be considered to be a minimal or high level depiction of the linkage between the items included in the product.
A Connector_based_interconnect_definition for connecting a computer to a monitor cable would indicate a linkage between the 'video out' connector on the computer and the 'computer' connector on the monitor cable.
